abstract: Dawn Hudson, new chief executive of Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences, has reputation for shaking things up; at issue is whether she can open group to fresh talent and ideas without losing confidence of board that built its nest egg, and Oscar brand, by protecting what already works.
snippet: When Dawn Hudson was appointed in June to lead the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences, she brought a reputation for shaking things up.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences

lead_paragraph: When Dawn Hudson was appointed in June to lead the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences, she brought a reputation for shaking things up.

headline.main: For the Academy’s New Chief, a Balancing Act
headline.print_headline: New Chief in a Balancing Act At the Hollywood Academy
headline.seo: Dawn Hudson’s New Job as the Academy’s Chief Is a Balancing Act
